properties.name: required
properties.description: Whether or not the input is required.

name: src/js/algorithm/algorithm-result.js
AlgorithmResult
description: Stores the results generated by running an Algorithm. An instance will be stored in each Algorithm object.

params.name: nodeFields
params.description: Array of fields to store changes for in Node objects.

params.name: edgeFields
params.description: Array of fields to store changes for in Edge objects.

name: addStep
description: Add a Step to the AlgorithmResult.

name: src/js/algorithm/change.js
Change
description: Represents changes for a Node or Edge during a step of the algorithm.

params.name: fields
params.description: Array of field names to be stored.

params.name: preValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values before the step.

params.name: duringValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values before the step.

params.name: postValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values after the step.

name: applyPre
description: Set object values to those it had before the step.

name: applyDuring
description: Set object values to those it had during the step.

name: applyPost
description: Set object values to those it had after the step.

name: src/js/algorithm/step-builder.js
addChange
description: Add a Node or Edge and its values to the step.

params.name: preValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values before the step.

params.name: duringValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values before the step.

params.name: postValues
params.description: Object containing field names and their respective values after the step.

name: src/js/algorithm/step.js
Step
description: Represents a step of an algorithm.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a Step.  Ensures description is not null or the empty string

params.name: description
params.description: A string describing the step of the algorithm.

name: addChange
description: Add a change in values for an object to this Step.

name: applyPre
description: Apply all pre-step values to objects.

name: applyDuring
description: Applies all step values to objects.

name: applyPost
description: Applies all post-step values to objects.

src/js/util/bezier.js
cuberoot
description:
Calculates cube root.
This is needed due to limits of Math.pow():
From [MDN]{@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math/pow}:
> due to "even" and "odd" roots laying close to each other,
> and limits in the floating number precision,
> negative bases with fractional exponents always return NaN

params.name: x
params.description: The number to find the cubic root of.

return.description: The cubic root of x.

name: solveLinear
description: Solve the root for a linear equation ax + b = 0.

return.description: Array containing the root of the equation.

name: solveQuadratic
description: Solve the root for a quadratic equation ax^2 + bx + c = 0.

params.name: epsilon
params.description: Margin of error for checking zero.

return.description: Array containing the root of the equation.

name: solveCubic
description:
Function to solve for x when ax^3 + bx^2 + c + d = 0.
Adapted from http://stackoverflow.com/a/27176424/1418962

params.name: epsilon
params.description: Margin of error for checking zero.

return.description: Array containing the root of the equation.

name: calcBezierDistance
description: Function that calculates the distance between a specified point and a quadratic bezier.

params.name: start
params.description: The start point of the bezier curve.

params.name: control
params.description: The control point of the bezier curve.

params.name: end
params.description: The end point of the bezier curve.

return.description: The distance between (pointX, pointY) and the bezier curve specified by start, control, and end.

name: bezierDerivative
description: Find the derivative of a quadratic bezier at a given point.

params.name: t
params.description: The point in the curve P(t) to find the derivative at.

params.name: start
params.description: The start point of the bezier curve.

params.name: control
params.description: The control point of the bezier curve.

params.name: end
params.description: The end point of the bezier curve.

return.description: Point object containing the x- and y-values of th derivative.

name: src/js/util/line-2d.js
Line2D
description: Class representing 2D lines. Container for a pair of 2D points and some helper functions.

name: length
description: Getter for the length of the line.

return.description: Length of the line.

name: hasPoint
description: Checks if the given point is on the line.

return.description: Whether or not the given point is on the line.

name: src/js/util/mouse-handler.js
src/js/util/point-2d.js
equals
description: Checks if this point and another point are equal. Returns true if the x- and y-coordinates are equal.

return.description: Whether or not the points are equivalent.

name: distanceTo
description: Finds the distance between this point and another point.

params.name: point
params.description: Point to find th distance to.

return.description: Distance between the points.

name: relativePositionToTriangle2D
description: Finds the coordinates this point should have relative to a triangle.

params.name: oldTriangle
params.description: Triangle2D object containing the triangle's old position.

params.name: newTriangle
params.description: Triangle2D object containing the triangle's new position.

return.description: Point representing the point's location relative the the triangle's new position.

name: translateVec
description: Translates the point using a vector.

params.name: vec
params.description: The vector to translate the point by.

return.description: Point resulting from the translation.

name: lineTo
description: Creates and returns a Line2D object using this point as the start point and another point as the end point.

params.name: point
params.description: Point to be used as the end point.

return.description: Line2D object created.

name: vectorTo
description: Finds the vector distance from this point to another point.

params.name: point
params.description: Point to find the vector distance to.

return.description: Vector2D object representing the vector distance.

name: src/js/util/queue.js
src/js/util/stack.js
src/js/util/triangle-2d.js
area
description:
Getter for the (signed) area of the triangle.

         1  | x1 y1 1 |
area =  --- | x2 y2 1 |
         2  | x3 y3 1 |

Source: http://mathworld.wolfram.com/TriangleArea.html

return.description: Signed area of the triangle.

name: getBarycentricCoordinates
description:
Find the barycentric coordinates of a point relative to this triangle.
Source: http://stackoverflow.com/a/14382692/1418962
More info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barycentric_coordinate_system#Conversion_between_barycentric_and_Cartesian_coordinates

params.name: point
params.description: The point to find the barycentric coordinates of.

return.description: Point object containing the barycentric coordinates.

name: getPointFromBarycentricCoordinates
description: Find the cartesian coordinates of a point given its barycentric coordinates.

params.name: point
params.description: The point to find the coordinates of.

return.description: Point object containing the cartesian coordinates.

name: src/js/util/vector-2d.js

return.description: The length of the vector.

name: equals
description: Checks if this vector and another vector are equal. Returns true if the x- and y-components are equal.

return.description: Whether or not the vectors are equivalent.

name: add
description: Finds the result of addition with another vector.

return.description: The result of vector addition.

name: sub
description: Finds the result of subtracting another vector.

return.description: The result of vector subtraction.

name: dot
description: Finds the dot product between this vector and another vector.

params.name: vec
params.description: Vector to find a dot product with.

return.description: The value of the dot product.

name: cross
description: Finds the "cross product" between this vector and another vector.

params.name: vec
params.description: Vector to find the cross product with.

return.description: The value of the cross product. Zero means the vectors are parallel.

name: scale
description: Finds the vector resulting from multiplication by a scalar.

return.description: Vector resulting from the scale.

name: rotateDegrees
description: Finds the vector resulting from a rotation in degrees.

return.description: Vector resulting from the rotation.

name: rotateRadians
description: Finds the vector resulting from a rotation in radians.

return.description: Vector resulting from the rotation.

name: degreesTo
description: Finds the angle between two vectors (in degrees).

params.name: vec
params.description: Vector to find the angle to.

return.description: Angle between the vectors in degrees.

name: projectOnto
description: Finds the vector projection of this vector onto another vector.

return.description: Vector resulting from the vector projection.

name: toPoint
description: Converts the Vector2D object to a Point2D object. x- and y-components of the vector are used as x- and y-coordinates for the point.

return.description: Point with the same x and y values as this vector.
